rec.boss_uptime_drop: Your active time on {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) drops to {{pct}}% vs your {{avg}}% average — a {{drop}}pt gap. You may be over-dodging or losing uptime to mechanics.
rec.boss_cpm_drop: Your cast rate on {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) drops to {{cpm}} CPM vs your {{avg}} average ({{dropPct}}% lower). Mechanics may be disrupting your rotation.
rec.boss_excess_damage: You take {{excessPct}}% more damage on {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) — {{dtps}} DTPS vs your {{avg}} average. Focus on that boss's avoidable damage.
rec.boss_death_spike: {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) has a {{rate}} death rate ({{multiple}}x your {{avg}} average) over {{fights}} fights. This boss's mechanics need extra attention.
rec.boss_potion_neglect: Combat potion usage on {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) is only {{rate}}%, but {{bestRate}}% on your best boss. Potions matter most where you struggle.
rec.boss_weakest_dps: Your weakest boss is {{weakBoss}} ({{weakDifficulty}}) at {{weakDpsVsMedian}}% vs median, while {{strongBoss}} is at {{strongDpsVsMedian}}%. Closing this {{gap}}% gap is your biggest opportunity.
rec.deaths_from_damage: On {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) your high death rate ({{deathRate}}) correlates with high damage taken ({{dtps}} vs {{avgDtps}} avg DTPS). You're dying to mechanics, not bad luck.
rec.uptime_drives_dps: On {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) low active time ({{activeTime}}% vs {{avgActiveTime}}% avg) is dragging your DPS to {{dpsVsMedian}}% vs median. More uptime = more DPS.
rec.parse_vs_raid: Your parse ({{parse}}%) and raid-relative performance ({{median}}% vs median) diverge. Your raid group's overall level may be affecting your relative standing.
rec.defensive_gap: Your death rate ({{deathRate}}/fight) is high but you only use healthstones in {{healthstoneRate}}% of fights. Use your defensives!
rec.high_death_rate: Your death rate ({{rate}}/fight) is very high. Review boss mechanics and improve positioning.
rec.low_active_time: Your active time is only {{pct}}%. Aim for >85% — every second not casting is lost DPS.
rec.low_cpm: Your CPM ({{cpm}}) is low. Minimize downtime between casts and reduce unnecessary movement.
rec.low_flask: Your flask uptime is {{uptime}}%. Keep it above 90% for consistent performance.
rec.no_food: Food buff active in only {{rate}}% of fights. Always eat before pulls!
rec.low_combat_potion: Combat potion usage is at {{rate}}%. Using potions consistently boosts your output significantly.
rec.low_interrupts: You average only {{avg}} interrupts per fight. Try to interrupt more when possible.
rec.low_parse: Your average parse is {{pct}}% — you're in the bottom quartile globally. Focus on rotation fundamentals and uptime.
rec.below_avg_parse: Your average parse ({{pct}}%) is below the global median. Small rotation and uptime improvements can push you higher.
rec.good_preparation: Excellent consumable preparation! Flasks, potions, and food are consistently used.
rec.strong_boss: Your strongest boss is {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) at {{dpsVsMedian}}% vs median — a great benchmark for your other encounters.
rec.gear_missing_enchants: You're missing enchants on {{count}} slots ({{slots}}). Each enchant adds ~200+ stats — don't leave free power on the table.
rec.gear_missing_gems: You have {{count}} empty gem socket(s) in {{slots}}. Gems are one of the easiest ways to boost your stats.
rec.gear_stat_vs_meta: Top {{spec}} players stack {{metaPct}}% {{stat}}, but you only have {{playerPct}}%. That's a {{gap}}% gap vs the meta.
rec.gear_wrong_stat_priority: Your top stat is {{topStat}} ({{topPct}}%), but your spec prioritizes {{expectedStats}}. Consider reforging or replacing off-stat gear. Priority: {{specPriority}}.
rec.gear_low_ilvl_slot: Your {{slot}} (ilvl {{itemLevel}}) is {{gap}} levels below your average ({{average}}). Upgrading this slot will have the biggest impact.
rec.gear_enchant_vs_meta: On {{slot}}, {{metaPct}}% of top players use "{{metaEnchant}}" but you have "{{playerEnchant}}". Consider switching for optimal stats.
rec.gear_stat_overcap: Your {{stat}} ({{value}}) exceeds the soft cap of {{cap}}. Consider redistributing excess stats to other secondaries.
rec.gear_suboptimal_enchant: Your {{slot}} has a defensive enchant ("{{enchant}}"). As DPS, you should use a throughput enchant instead for better damage output.
rec.gear_well_optimized: Your gear is well optimized! All enchants present, gems socketed, and stats aligned with your spec priority.
rec.talent_off_meta: You're using {{talentName}} which only {{metaPct}}% of top {{spec}} players take. Consider {{metaAlternative}} instead.
rec.talent_missing_key: {{metaPct}}% of top {{spec}} players use {{talentName}}, but you don't have it. This is likely a significant throughput talent.
rec.spec_cpm_context: Your CPM ({{cpm}}) is low for {{spec}}. Focus on {{context}}.
rec.spec_uptime_context: Your active time ({{pct}}%) is low for {{spec}}. Focus on {{context}}.
rec.spec_deaths_context: Your death rate ({{rate}}/fight) is high. Use {{defensiveCd}} more proactively to survive mechanics.
rec.tank_death_impact: As a tank, your death rate ({{rate}}/fight) directly causes wipes. Focus on active mitigation timing and defensive CD usage on high-damage phases.
rec.tank_low_cpm_mitigation: Your CPM ({{cpm}}) is {{pct}}% of the expected {{expected}} for {{spec}}. Low cast rate as a tank means gaps in active mitigation — keep your rotation tight.
rec.tank_dtps_outlier: On {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) you take {{dtps}} DTPS ({{excessPct}}% above your average). Review your defensive CD timing and positioning on this fight.
rec.healer_low_dispels: You average only {{avg}} dispels per fight across {{fights}} fights. Timely dispels prevent cascading damage — make them a priority.
rec.healer_death_impact: Your death rate ({{rate}}/fight) as a healer means the raid loses healing at critical moments. Positioning and personal CD usage are crucial.
rec.tank_low_interrupts: You average {{avg}} interrupts per fight. As a tank, you're often best positioned to interrupt — aim for {{target}}+ per fight.
rec.no_recent_data: No recent raid data found. Import a Warcraft Logs report to get personalized coaching tips.
rec.no_mplus_activity: You have raid data but no Mythic+ runs this season. Running keys helps fill your weekly vault and improves overall gameplay.
